desc: We set out to change the bra industry for girls. We celebrate girls as they are, and create the best possible products to support them as they grow up and take on the world. Our products are made exclusively for girls, each piece infused with an extra boost of confidence!

layout.text:

Use code "stockup20 for 20% off orders over $200
Use code "stockup25 for 25% off orders over $300
